categories.title: Badges
categories.subtitle: Price incl. laminating, die-cutting and keychain eyelet · digital / traditional
categories.description: Wearable art pieces made for conventions or everyday use. Badges are laminated and cut to shape, often used for identification or just to show off your character.

categories.title: Reference Sheets
categories.subtitle: Price depends on character complexity / number of views. · digital only
categories.description: A full overview of your character with multiple poses and views. Perfect for artists to capture consistent designs or to introduce your OC to the community.

categories.title: Sketches
categories.subtitle: Quick sketch style · SFW / NSFW · digital / traditional
categories.description: Fast and expressive drawings that capture the essence of a character. Ideal for warm-up art, playful concepts or just a looser take on your OC.

categories.title: Line Art
categories.subtitle: Clean lines, without coloring · SFW / NSFW · digital / traditional
categories.description: Crisp outlines ready for coloring or standalone black-and-white artwork. A versatile style that balances detail and clarity.

categories.title: Full Art (SFW)
categories.subtitle: Full-color illustration (incl. shadings) · SFW · digital / traditional
categories.description: Finished illustrations with full color and shading, bringing your character to life in a safe-for-work context. Great for profile art or personal galleries.

categories.title: Full Art (NSFW)
categories.subtitle: Full-color illustration (incl. shadings) · NSFW (18+) · digital / traditional
categories.description: Detailed illustrations with mature themes. Intended for adult audiences only, handled with the same attention to detail as SFW art.

categories.title: Logos & Tribals
categories.subtitle: Custom symbol or mark for use as wall-, car-, body-tattoo etc. · b/w or colored · I won't apply them to your wall, car or body! · digital only
categories.description: Custom-designed symbols and tribal patterns, usable for branding, decoration, or tattoo concepts. A focus on bold shapes and strong visual identity.

categories.title: Sticker Packs (Telegram)
categories.subtitle: Shadings will add +2€ per sticker · Bundled as sticker pack (on request) · digital only
categories.description: Fun, expressive stickers of your character made for Telegram or other chat apps. Packs can cover different moods and reactions to use in conversation.

categories.title: Button- & Sticker-Prints
categories.subtitle: Physical items · Various designs available (see gallery) · Custom designs on request.
categories.description: Collectible physical items like pin-buttons and vinyl stickers. Popular at conventions and perfect for decorating laptops, bags, or to trade with friends.
